abstracts.cdata!:
The Provincial Reform Loan to Support
            the Province of Santa Fe Project, will support poverty
            alleviation, and equity improvement over the long term, and,
            strengthen the social safety net during the current economic
            downturn. Specific actions to strengthen the social safety
            net include: protective measures for the new income support
            program against budget cuts, and, promotion efforts to
            enhance its effectiveness; pre-natal care for poor pregnant
            women; and, improvement of primary care for poor children.
            Over the medium to long-term, poverty alleviation, and
            equity improvements will include actions supporting human
            resource development, such as basic health coverage to
            non-insured poor people, public spending support towards
            schools in poorer neighborhoods, and, measures to enhance
            sustainable economic growth, and competitiveness, which
            includes a fiscal program, consistent with national efforts
            to strengthen public finances, and risk reduction.
            Additionally, public investments will alleviate
            infrastructure bottlenecks, and power tariff reductions will
            be in place for small, and medium-sized firms, as will lower
            labor costs, through the elimination of local payroll taxes.
